info.name: PH HealthCare API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for PH HealthCare Backend with all modules including User, Auth, Admin, Doctor, Patient, Specialties, Schedule, Appointment, Payment, Prescription, Review, and Meta

item.name: 1. Auth Module

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns access token and refresh token.
Get new access token using refresh token
Change password for authenticated user (All roles)
Send password reset link to email
Reset password using token from email

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, token refresh, password management

item.name: 2. User Module

request.description: Get all users with pagination and filtering (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)
Get current user's profile (All authenticated users)
Create new admin user (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)

formdata.value:
{
  "password": "doctor123",
  "doctor": {
    "name": "Dr. John Smith",
    "email": "doctor@example.com",
    "contactNumber": "+1234567890",
    "address": "123 Medical Plaza",
    "registrationNumber": "REG-2024-001",
    "experience": 10,
    "gender": "MALE",
    "appointmentFee": 500,
    "qualification": "MBBS, MD",
    "currentWorkingPlace": "City Hospital",
    "designation": "Senior Cardiologist",
    "specialties": ["specialty-uuid-1", "specialty-uuid-2"]
  }
}

request.description: Create new doctor with specialties (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)
Update user status: ACTIVE, BLOCKED, DELETED (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)

item.description: User management endpoints for creating users, profile management, and status updates

request.description: Get all admins with pagination (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)
Get admin details by ID (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)
Soft delete admin (set isDeleted flag) (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)

item.name: 4. Doctor Module

request.description: Get all doctors with filtering and pagination (Public)
Get AI-powered doctor specialty suggestions based on symptoms (Public)
Update doctor details including add/remove specialties (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN, DOCTOR)

item.description: Doctor management endpoints including AI suggestions

request.description: Create new specialty with icon upload
Delete specialty by ID (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN only)
Get schedule by ID (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN, DOCTOR)
Get all doctor schedules with filtering (All authenticated users)
Update appointment status: SCHEDULED, INPROGRESS, COMPLETED, CANCELED (SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN, DOCTOR)

item.name: 10. Payment Module

request.description: Initialize payment for appointment (Returns payment gateway URL)
Payment gateway IPN callback (Called by payment gateway)

item.description: Payment processing with Stripe - Webhook handled at POST /webhook

request.description: Create review for completed appointment (PATIENT only)
Get dashboard metadata (counts, statistics) based on user role (All authenticated users)
